/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, power lines crisscross against the sky, a testament to the city's modern infrastructure. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
